Conway.D.O. Harton House: The D.O. Harton House is a historic house at 607 Davis Street in Conway, Arkansas. It is a 2-1/2 story wood frame structure, with a hip roof, weatherboard siding, and a brick foundation. A hip-roof dormer projects from the front of the roof, and a single-story porch extends across the front, supported by wooden box columns with Classical detailing.
